mapper.select: SELECT category_id,title,type FROM wk_oa_examine_category WHERE is_deleted = 0

select a.* from wk_oa_examine a where a.examine_status != 4 and a.create_user_id = #{userId} and a.category_id = #{categoryId} and (DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,#{sqlDateFormat}) between #{beginTime} and #{finalTime}) order by a.create_time desc

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(money), 0) as money,IFNULL(SUM(duration), 0) as duration FROM wk_oa_examine as a WHERE a.category_id = #{categoryId} and a.examine_status = 1 and (DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,#{sqlDateFormat}) between #{beginTime} and #{finalTime}) and a.create_user_id = #{userId} limit 1
